title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2016 - Iasi, Romania
description:
For the first time in Ia»ôi we will run a Code Retreat on the occasion of the 2016 GDCR. By a fortunate coincidence the day coincides with the CodeCamp conference. CodeCamp is facilitating our hosting at their venue Hotel International. Bring a laptop and get ready for some fun action! 
Because seats are limited, please sign up in advance using this form:https://goo.gl/forms/jj6Wz97sGCMhoKrD2 
https://www.facebook.com/events/321643241511287/
